Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are rerouted in both directions via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski, 79th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage nr 79th/Central Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski, 79th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 95th/Dan Ryan and Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/Dan Ryan and Garfield due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at 79th/Dan Ryan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/Dan Ryan and Garfield due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at 79th/Dan Ryan.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and Garfield at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between 95th/Dan Ryan and Garfield to provide connecting service.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

#29 State
#75 75th
#79 79th

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
